channel.title: Macbook on joh.fi
channel.description: Recent content in Macbook on joh.fi

item.title: Waiting for Haswell Macbook Pros
item.description: I am a strong believer of mobile computing and to me a perfect setup is a small laptop that can be connected to a bigger screen via docking station or similar setup. My current setup consists of two year old Lenovo X220 and a high resolution Dell U2711. I’ve been quite happy with it. Laptop is easy to take out from the docking station, which by the way comes with the device, and it serves as a desktop replacement while at home.
